elements.name: Add items to the cart and verify the cart

steps.name: User successfully logged in to the SauceDemo application
User adds the "Sauce Labs Backpack" to the cart
User adds the "Sauce Labs Bike Light" to the cart
User navigates to the cart
User should see "Sauce Labs Backpack" in the cart
User should see "Sauce Labs Bike Light" in the cart
the cart badge should show "2" items

elements.name: Add items to the cart and verify the cart

steps.name: User successfully logged in to the SauceDemo application
User adds the "Sauce Labs Bolt T-Shirt" to the cart
User adds the "Sauce Labs Fleece Jacket" to the cart
User navigates to the cart
User should see "Sauce Labs Bolt T-Shirt" in the cart
User should see "Sauce Labs Fleece Jacket" in the cart
the cart badge should show "2" items

elements.name: Add items to the cart and verify the cart

steps.name: User successfully logged in to the SauceDemo application
User adds the "Sauce Labs Onesie" to the cart
User adds the "Test.allTheThings() T-Shirt (Red)" to the cart
User navigates to the cart
User should see "Sauce Labs Onesie" in the cart
User should see "Test.allTheThings() T-Shirt (Red)" in the cart
the cart badge should show "2" items

elements.name: Remove an item from the cart

steps.name: User has "Sauce Labs Backpack" and "Sauce Labs Bike Light" in the cart
User removes "Sauce Labs Bike Light" from the cart
User should see only "Sauce Labs Backpack" in the cart
the cart badge should show "1" items

elements.name: Remove an item from the cart

steps.name: User has "Sauce Labs Fleece Jacket" and "Sauce Labs Onesie" in the cart
User removes "Sauce Labs Onesie" from the cart
User should see only "Sauce Labs Fleece Jacket" in the cart
the cart badge should show "1" items

elements.name: Remove an item from the cart

steps.name: User has "Sauce Labs Onesie" and "Test.allTheThings() T-Shirt (Red)" in the cart
User removes "Test.allTheThings() T-Shirt (Red)" from the cart
User should see only "Sauce Labs Onesie" in the cart
the cart badge should show "1" items

name: Cart functionality on Sauce Demo website

elements.name: Successful checkout

steps.name: User successfully logged in to the SauceDemo application
User adds the "Sauce Labs Backpack" to the cart
User adds the "Sauce Labs Onesie" to the cart
User navigates to the cart
User clicks on the Checkout button
User fills out the checkout information with first name "John", last name "Doe", and postal code "12345"
User continues to the next step
User should see a summary of their order
User should see the total price including tax
User finishes the checkout
User should see the order confirmation page with the message "Thank you for your order!"

elements.name: Checkout with missing first name

steps.name: User successfully logged in to the SauceDemo application
User adds the "Sauce Labs Backpack" to the cart
User navigates to the cart
User clicks on the Checkout button
User fills out the checkout information with first name "", last name "Doe", and postal code "12345"
User tries to continue to the next step
User should see an error message "Error: First Name is required"

elements.name: Checkout with missing first name

steps.name: User successfully logged in to the SauceDemo application
User adds the "Sauce Labs Backpack" to the cart
User navigates to the cart
User clicks on the Checkout button
User fills out the checkout information with first name "John", last name "", and postal code ""
User tries to continue to the next step
User should see an error message "Error: Last Name is required"

elements.name: Checkout with missing first name

steps.name: User successfully logged in to the SauceDemo application
User adds the "Sauce Labs Backpack" to the cart
User navigates to the cart
User clicks on the Checkout button
User fills out the checkout information with first name "", last name "", and postal code ""
User tries to continue to the next step
User should see an error message "Error: First Name is required"

elements.name: Checkout with missing first name

steps.name: User successfully logged in to the SauceDemo application
User adds the "Sauce Labs Backpack" to the cart
User navigates to the cart
User clicks on the Checkout button
User fills out the checkout information with first name "John", last name "Doe", and postal code ""
User tries to continue to the next step
User should see an error message "Error: Postal Code is required"

name: Checkout process on Sauce Demo website

elements.name: Successful login with valid credentials

steps.name: User on the SauceDemo login page
User input "standard_user" as username
User input "secret_sauce" as password
User click on the login button
User should be redirected to the products page

elements.name: Unsuccessful login with locked user,invalid username and password

steps.name: User on the SauceDemo login page
User input "locked_out_user" as username
User input "secret_sauce" as password
User click on the login button
User should see an error message "Epic sadface: Sorry, this user has been locked out."

arguments.val: "Epic sadface: Sorry, this user has been locked out."

elements.name: Unsuccessful login with locked user,invalid username and password

steps.name: User on the SauceDemo login page
User input "standard_user" as username
User input "password" as password
User click on the login button
User should see an error message "Epic sadface: Username and password do not match any user in this service"

arguments.val: "Epic sadface: Username and password do not match any user in this service"

elements.name: Unsuccessful login with locked user,invalid username and password

steps.name: User on the SauceDemo login page
User input "username" as username
User input "secret_sauce" as password
User click on the login button
User should see an error message "Epic sadface: Username and password do not match any user in this service"

arguments.val: "Epic sadface: Username and password do not match any user in this service"

elements.name: Successful logout after login

steps.name: User successfully logged in to the SauceDemo application
User click on the menu burger button
User click the logout button
User should be redirected to the login page

elements.name: Remove product

steps.name: User successfully logged in to the SauceDemo application
User add the "Sauce Labs Backpack" to my cart
User add the "Sauce Labs Bike Light" to my cart
the cart badge should show "2"
User remove product added "Sauce Labs Bike Light"
the cart badge should show "1"

elements.name: Sort products by Sorting Type

steps.name: User successfully logged in to the SauceDemo application
User select the "Name (A to Z)" sorting option
the products should be displayed in "alphabetical (A to Z)" order

elements.name: Sort products by Sorting Type

steps.name: User successfully logged in to the SauceDemo application
User select the "Name (Z to A)" sorting option
the products should be displayed in "reverse alphabetical (Z to A)" order

elements.name: Sort products by Sorting Type

steps.name: User successfully logged in to the SauceDemo application
User select the "Price (low to high)" sorting option
the products should be displayed in "ascending (low to high)" order

elements.name: Sort products by Sorting Type

steps.name: User successfully logged in to the SauceDemo application
User select the "Price (high to low)" sorting option
the products should be displayed in "descending (high to low)" order

name: Product Interaction in SauceDemo Inventory
description:
As a user of SauceDemo
  I want to interact with products in the inventory
  So that I can add them to my cart and view details
